title: Retrieve Self Assessment Tax Calculation End of Year Estimate
description: Retrieve Self Assessment Tax Calculation End of Year Estimate

summary.description: Details the high-level Income Tax and National Insurance Contributions due

totalEstimatedIncome.title: totalEstimatedIncome
totalEstimatedIncome.description: The total estimated end of year income. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.

totalTaxableIncome.title: totalTaxableIncome
totalTaxableIncome.description: The total taxable end of year income. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No Decimals.

incomeTaxAmount.title: incomeTaxAmount
incomeTaxAmount.description: The estimated end of year Income Tax amount. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

nic2.title: nic2
nic2.description: The estimated end of year Class 2 National Insurance contributions amount. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

nic4.title: nic4
nic4.description: The estimated end of year Class 4 National Insurance contributions amount. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

totalNicAmount.title: totalNicAmount
totalNicAmount.description: The estimated end of year combined Class 2 and Class 4 National Insurance contributions amount. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

incomeTaxNicAmount.title: incomeTaxNicAmount
incomeTaxNicAmount.description: The estimated end of year combined Class 2 and Class 4 National Insurance contributions amount. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

detail.description: Details the low-level taxable income amounts of each income source

selfEmployments.description: A list of self-employment business detailing the taxable income estimate for each business

selfEmploymentId.title: selfEmploymentId
selfEmploymentId.description: An identifier for the self-employment business, unique to the customer.

taxableIncome.title: taxableIncome
taxableIncome.description: The estimated end of year income. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

finalised.title: finalised
finalised.description: Shows whether the self-employment income has been finalised.

ukPropertyFhl.description: Details the taxable income estimate for UK Property FHL

taxableIncome.title: taxableIncome
taxableIncome.description: The estimated end of year income. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

finalised.title: finalised
finalised.description: Shows whether the UK Property FHL income has been finalised.

ukPropertyNonFhl.description: Details the taxable income estimate for UK Property Non-FHL

taxableIncome.title: taxableIncome
taxableIncome.description: The estimated end of year taxable income. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

finalised.title: finalised
finalised.description: Shows whether the UK Property Non-FHL income has been finalised.

dividends.description: Details the taxable income estimate for dividends

taxableIncome.title: taxableIncome
taxableIncome.description: The estimated end of year taxable income. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

savings.description: Details the taxable income estimate for savings

savingsAccountId.title: savingsAccountId
savingsAccountId.description: The unique identifier of the savings account.

savingsAccountName.title: savingsAccountName
savingsAccountName.description: Friendly account name. Each account name will be unique for that National Insurance number. The account name will be between 1 and 32 characters in length. Allowed characters, including spaces are: mixed case alphanumeric characters and the characters; &'()*,-./@£.

taxableIncome.title: taxableIncome
taxableIncome.description: The estimated end of year taxable income. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.
